Tractor.Attributes: Two large black rear wheels with yellow hubs, two smaller front wheels with yellow hubs, two red handrails on the seat, yellow plow on green frame
Tractor.Locations: Under a triangular simple pergola on the green grass

Pergola.Locations: Above the tractor on the green grass

Steeple House.Attributes: Red walls, white foundation, square window at the top, rectangular door at the bottom
Steeple House.Locations: Under the big tree, in front of the tractor

Big Tree.Locations: In front of the tractor, above the steeple house

Concrete Step.Locations: In front of the door of the steeple house

Pergola 2.Attributes: Similar to the one above the tractor
Pergola 2.Locations: In front of the steeple house
